alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued October 25 at 3:32AM PDT until October 26 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Northern Trinity, Southern Trinity and Northeastern Mendocino Interior. * WHEN...From this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity
